CatDescriptText: Mr. Herb Nusser of Liberty Photo Shop, 606 Wood Street, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 4, 1958, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think that Sherman Adams was guilty of misconduct in office of assistant to the President? Do you think that he should have resigned?" answer reads: "That is a difficult question because of the definition of what is misconduct in office." The rest of the statement is illegible.
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Herb Nusser, owner of Liberty Photo Shop, wearing eyeglasses and bow tie, standing in front of shop on Wood Street, Downtown
